subject: Problems when Getting started
msgSnippet: Hello anyone I want to start using Junit. I have unpacked the junit4.1 and set the CLASSPATH to: C: junit4.1 junit-4.1.jar; C: junit4.1 But when I try to run
messageBody:
Hello anyone

I want to start using Junit. I have unpacked the junit4.1 and set the
CLASSPATH to: C:\junit4.1\junit-4.1.jar; C:\junit4.1\

But when I try to run the test a get this:

C:\junit4.1\junit\tests>java AllTests.class
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:AllTests/class

I can't find the problem. Can anyone help??

Kind regards
Jimmi Wolff
